title: Kasam - Tere Pyaar Ki
overview: The basic story of the serial is about Tanu and Rishi who are childhood friends. Under a prophecy made by a sadhu woman after saved by Tanu, Tanu is destined to shield and protect Rishi from any possible danger or omen. But apparently, Rishi mother who dislikes Rishiâ€™s choice as well as their family made her move to USA.
